mapper.sql: id, qie, cost_name, specification_code, calculate_way, count, unit, source, unit_price, cid, amount, remarks
mapper.select: select t2.id,t2.qie,t2.cost_code,t2.cost_name,t2.specification_code,t2.specification_name,t2.calculate_way,t2.count,t2.unit,t2.source,t2.unit_price,t2.cid,t2.amount,t2.remarks, t3.currency_code, CONCAT(t2.amount,' ',t3.currency_code) amountFormat from ( select DISTINCT t1.id,substring_index( substring_index(t1.qid,',',t2.id + 1), ',' ,-1 ) as qid from (select id,qid from quotation_template where id = #{qie}) t1 join help_index t2 on t2.id < (length(t1.qid) - length(REPLACE(t1.qid,',','')) + 1 ) ) t LEFT JOIN quotation_type t1 ON t1.id = t.qid LEFT JOIN template_cope_receivable t2 ON t2.qie = t.id and t2.specification_code = t1.`code` LEFT JOIN currency_info t3 on t3.id = t2.cid

select t2.id,t2.qie,t2.cost_code,t2.cost_name,t2.specification_code,t2.specification_name,t2.calculate_way,t2.count,t2.unit,t2.source,t2.unit_price,t2.cid,t2.amount,t2.remarks, t3.currency_code, CONCAT(t2.amount,' ',t3.currency_code) amountFormat from ( select DISTINCT t1.id,substring_index( substring_index(t1.area_id,',',t2.id + 1), ',' ,-1 ) as area_id from (select id,area_id from quotation_template where id = #{qie}) t1 join help_index t2 on t2.id < (length(t1.area_id) - length(REPLACE(t1.area_id,',','')) + 1 ) ) t LEFT JOIN shipping_area t1 ON t1.id = t.area_id LEFT JOIN template_cope_receivable t2 ON t2.qie = t.id and t2.specification_code = t1.warehouse_code LEFT JOIN currency_info t3 on t3.id = t2.cid

select t.id,t.qie,t.cost_code,t.cost_name,t.specification_code,t.specification_name,t.calculate_way,t.count,t.unit,t.source,t.unit_price,t.cid,t.amount,t.remarks, t1.currency_code, CONCAT(t.amount,' ',t1.currency_code) amountFormat from template_cope_receivable t LEFT JOIN currency_info t1 on t1.id = t.cid where t.qie=#{qie} and t.cost_code not in('JYD-REC-COS-00001','JYD-REC-COS-00002');

select t.id, t.qie, t.cost_code, t.cost_name, t.specification_code, t.specification_name, t.calculate_way, t.count, t.unit, t.source, t.unit_price, t.cid, t.amount, t.remarks, t1.currency_code, t1.currency_name from template_cope_receivable t left join currency_info t1 on t1.id = t.cid where t.qie = #{qie}
